finalproject.title: Final Year Project - IoT-Based Smart Energy Meter with Theft Detection
finalproject.description: Developed an IoT-based Smart Energy Meter with Theft Detection using Arduino, GSM, and LDR sensors to monitor energy usage and detect electricity theft in real-time. The system sends SMS alerts if unauthorized tampering is detected. The project was extended into a research paper published in Gradiva Review Journal (UGC-CARE, Scopus Indexed), Volume 11, Issue 6, June 2025.
achievements: Designed and implemented a real-time energy monitoring system
Integrated GSM module for instant SMS alerts on theft detection
Published research paper in Gradiva Review Journal (UGC-CARE, Scopus Indexed)
